Title: Defense Rests
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Prentice Penny, Matt O'Brien, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake to tries to impress Sophia's boss. Gina refuses to give her blessing to her mom's engagement. Holt faces a difficult decision.
